column2: "You came at a good time! Do you mind if I ask you something?"
"I was thinking that if I could get the feeling of it, then maybe I'd be able to control them too."
"That doesn't seem to be the case. I asked others too and they couldn't explain it either."
"Maybe not knowing what it feels like means I don't have the knack for it."
"I'll just have to search for something else I can contribute."
